name: Thomas Avice
bio: I am a highly skilled and motivated software engineer with a deep passion for cleantech, contech, and proptech. With a proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions: I am fully dedicated to drive innovation in these rapidly-evolving industries. I am well-versed in a range of programming languages and frameworks, including Python, JavaScript, and React; have a strong understanding of software development methodologies such as Agile and Scrum and I am always committed to staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends, constantly seeking new ways to improve my skills
